snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency granted Lance Armstrong more time to answer the charges against him, and a federal judge may rule on whether it can go forward.
abstract: United States Anti-Doping Agency grants Lance Armstrong a 30-day extension to answer the charges against him, and a federal judge may rule on whether the agency can go forward with its case.
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency granted Lance Armstrong more time to answer the charges against him, and a federal judge may rule on whether it can go forward.

headline.seo: Armstrong Gets Extension From Anti-Doping Agency
